T02D1794:162a-2: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'dus
T02D1794:162a-3: pa'i don rgya cher bshad pa 'dis ni dbang po
T02D1794:162a-4: rnon po dang / dbang po rtul po'i gang zag gnyi ga gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1794:162a-5: de dag gis ni don mdor bsdus pa bstan to //
T02D1794:162a-6: de nas rgyud kyi mtha'i yi ge shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1794:162a-7: shes nas mtha' drug la 'jug go //
T02D1794:162a-9: mtha' drug la 'jug pa yin pas na mtha' drug la 'jug pa zhe'o //
T02D1794:162a-10: mtha' drug po 'di yang gang la 'jug ce na /
T02D1794:162a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po la sogs pa la 'jug go //
T02D1794:162a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad ni mtha' rnam pa drug las mi 'da'o //
T02D1794:162a-14: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi mtha'i yi ge shes par bya ste /
T02D1794:162a-16: ji srid ya ra la ha'i bar //
T02D1794:162a-17: ka ga gha mtha' na dza'i mtha' //
T02D1794:162a-18: da bha'i mtha' dang ma mthar bcas //
T02D1794:162a-19: zhes pa 'di dag ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi ming gi mtha'i yi ge'o //
T02D1794:162a-20: 'di dag ni dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa las kyang /
T02D1794:162a-21: bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi ming gi mtha'i yi ge gang lags /
T02D1794:162a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
T02D1794:162a-23: byams pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang /
T02D1794:162a-24: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rnams kyi ming gi mtha'i yi ge ni 'di dag tsam du zad de /
T02D1794:162a-25: aa ka kha ga gha nga /
T02D1794:162a-31: sha sha sa ha ksha: byang chub sems dpa' sems
T02D1794:162a-32: dpa' chen po ka'i mtha' can ni sum cu rtsa
T02D1794:162a-33: gnyis so // de bzhin du ha'i mtha' can gyi bar du yang sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1794:162a-35: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud ni stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1794:162a-37: ji srid ya ra la ha'i bar //
T02D1794:162a-38: zhes bya ba la sogs bas ni a'a li k'a li yang gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1794:162a-40: rdo rje rgyan gyi rgyud las kyang /
T02D1794:162a-41: a'a li k'a li mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1794:162a-44: 'khor lo bzhi ni a'a li k'a li las gzhan ma yin no //
T02D1794:162a-45: 'khor lo bzhi las ni rdo rje bzlas pa dang /
T02D1794:162b-1: 'od gsal ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1794:162b-3: snying gi dbus na mi shigs pa //
T02D1794:162b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02D1794:162b-8: rdo rje bzlas dang sems la dmigs //
T02D1794:162b-9: sgyu ma'i 'od gsal zung du 'jug / thams cad 'di las 'byung ba yin //
T02D1794:162b-11: de bas na rlung las ni rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1794:162b-12: rnam par shes pa las ni nye bar len pa'i lus 'byung ngo //
T02D1794:162b-13: de bas na nyams su len pa'i rnal 'byor bas kyang dang po ni rlung la bslab par bya'o //
T02D1794:162b-14: de nas ni rnam par shes pa la bslab par bya'o //
T02D1794:162b-15: rnam par shes pa las rlung la lobs par 'dod
T02D1794:162b-16: pas kyang 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi'i yi ge'i don
T02D1794:162b-17: ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1794:162b-18: yi ge de dag kyang mtha' gang du 'dus she na /
T02D1794:162b-19: de de'i rtsa ba yi ge gsum //
T02D1794:162b-21: mtha' can gyi rgyud de dang de'i rtsa ba byed ces sbyar ro //
T02D1794:162b-22: yi ge gsum pa'i ngo bo gang yin zhe na /
T02D1794:162b-23: skyes bu sgra la gzhol ba rnams kyi dbang du byas te /
T02D1794:162b-24: sa ma dza zhes pa ni 'dus pa'i ming gi yi ge'o //
T02D1794:162b-25: yang na sgom pa la mchog tu byas te /
T02D1794:162b-26: de de'i rtsa ba yi ge gsum //
T02D1794:162b-27: ba zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1794:162b-28: kyi thabs kyi yi ge dang shes rab kyi yi
T02D1794:162b-29: ge'i rtsa ba ni aom a'a:h'um zhes pa ste /
T02D1794:162b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yi ge gsum las mi 'da'o //
T02D1794:162b-31: yi ge gsum de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thob par byed pa'i thabs las mi 'da' la /
T02D1794:162b-32: yi ge gsum du yang thams cad ji ltar 'du zhe na /
T02D1794:162b-33: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni rdo rje gsum las mi 'da' ste /
T02D1794:162b-34: 'di ltar yi ge aom ni sku rdo rje'o //
T02D1794:162b-37: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sku rnam pa gsum la mi 'da' la /
T02D1794:162b-38: yi ge aom ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1794:162b-39: a'a:ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1794:162b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbang du byas pa de bzhin no //
T02D1794:163a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smin par byed pa'i @163a * //
T02D1794:163a-2: yi ge aom ni bum pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D1794:163a-3: yi ge a'a: ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo //
T02D1794:163a-4: h'um ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo //
T02D1794:163a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rim pa lnga pa ji ltar 'du zhe na /
T02D1794:163a-6: 'di ltar yi ge a'a:ni rdo rje bzlas pa'o //
T02D1794:163a-7: h'um ni sems la dmigs pa dang 'od gsal ba dang /
T02D1794:163a-9: aom ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku'o //
T02D1794:163a-10: rdo rje bzlas ba 'ba' zhig gi dbang du byas te /
T02D1794:163a-11: yi ge gsum ni 'di ltar 'byung ba dang /
T02D1794:163a-12: 'jug pa dang gnas pa gsum du yi ge gsum ni ci rigs su sbyar ro //
T02D1794:163a-13: sems la dmigs pa 'ba' zhig gi dbang du byas pa'i yi ge gsum ni snang ba dang /
T02D1794:163a-15: snang ba thob pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1794:163a-16: yi ge gsum dang ci rigs su sbyar ro //
T02D1794:163a-17: sgyu ma lta bu'i sku 'ba' zhig gi dbang du
T02D1794:163a-18: byas pa'i yi ge gsum ni sku sgyu ma lta
T02D1794:163a-19: bu dang / gsung sgyu ma lta bu dang /
T02D1794:163a-20: thugs sgyu ma lta bu'i yi ge gsum dang go rims su sbyar ro //
T02D1794:163a-21: 'od gsal 'ba' zhig gi dbang du byas pa'i yi ge gsum ni 'od gsal ba'i ye shes dang /
T02D1794:163a-22: 'od gsal ba dang cha 'dra ba'i ye shes dang /
T02D1794:163a-23: kun rdzob kyi bden pa yi ge gsum dang go rims su sbyar ro //
T02D1794:163a-24: zung du 'jug pa 'ba' zhig pa'i dbang du byas
T02D1794:163a-25: pa'i yi ge gsum ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa
T02D1794:163a-26: dang rtsol ba med pa dang shin tu rtsol ba
T02D1794:163a-27: med pa gsum dang go rims su sbyar ro //
T02D1794:163a-28: yang na spros pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1794:163a-30: shin tu spros pa med pa'i go rims su sbyar ro //
T02D1794:163a-31: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni yi ge gsum mo //
T02D1794:163a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don gyi rnam
T02D1794:163a-33: pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgra'i rnam pa la
T02D1794:163a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra'i tshogs ni ngag gi lam nas 'byung ba yin la /
T02D1794:163a-36: de yang lhan cig tu dbugs dang gnas pa yin te /
T02D1794:163a-39: gnas pa las gnas pa'i sgra ni yi ge gsum las byung ba'i sgra'o //
T02D1794:163a-41: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
T02D1794:163b-0: khong nas @163b 'byung ba skye ba med //
T02D1794:163b-1: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02D1794:163b-2: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02D1794:163b-4: gsang ba thig le'i rgyud las //
T02D1794:163b-5: sgra rnams yi ge las byung ste //
T02D1794:163b-6: yi ge yi ge gsum las byung //
T02D1794:163b-7: de phyir sgra rnams thams cad kyi //
T02D1794:163b-8: rgyu ni yi ge gsum du 'dus //
T02D1794:163b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa dang /
T02D1794:163b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yi ge rnam
T02D1794:163b-12: pa gsum ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
T02D1794:163b-13: med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
T02D1794:163b-14: de bas na yi ge la 'dus pa ji bzhin
T02D1794:163b-15: du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'dus pa la
T02D1794:163b-18: thub pa chen pos chos phung po //
T02D1794:163b-19: brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa yin //
T02D1794:163b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa
T02D1794:163b-22: brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnyen por chos kyi pung
T02D1794:163b-23: po brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs te de dag gi
T02D1794:163b-24: snod 'dus pa 'di gang yin zhe na /
T02D1794:163b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dam tshig gi
T02D1794:163b-26: sgo nas sangs rgyas la dam tshig dang sdom pa
T02D1794:163b-27: thams cad ni lus dang ngag 'dul bar byed pas
T02D1794:163b-30: bzhi dang spyi dang khyad par gyi //
T02D1794:163b-31: dam tshig mchog ni rmad po che //
T02D1794:163b-32: sdom pa gsum la rab gnas pa //
T02D1794:163b-33: 'dul ba'i sdom pa kun gyi mchog / ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:163b-34: mdo sde dang mngon pa la yang de bzhin te /
T02D1794:163b-35: 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po mdor bsdus pa gsungs pas /
T02D1794:163b-38: de bas 'dis ni rgyud kyi che ba yang bstan par bya ste mchog yin zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1794:163b-39: gzhung nyung ba la don mang ba zhes pa ni
T02D1794:163b-40: gzhung gi tshogs phra mo tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs
T02D1794:163b-41: pa'i bka' mtha' dag gi don rnyed par 'gyur ba'i
T02D1794:163b-42: phyir de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:163b-43: 'di dag gis ni rgyud kyi che ba yang bstan par rig par bya'o //
T02D1794:163b-44: de nas rgyu rnyed par dka' ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1794:163b-45: 'dus pa'i rgyud ni rnyed dka' zhing //
T02D1794:163b-46: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1794:164a-1: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang the tshom
T02D1794:164a-2: skyed par byed pa yin na gzhan lta ci smos
T02D1794:164a-3: zhes gzhung 'di nyid las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:164a-4: sangs rgyas the tshom skye ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1794:164a-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la nam yang the tshom yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1794:164a-6: de bas na 'di dag gi don ni tshogs dang
T02D1794:164a-7: bla ma'i gang zag gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1794:164a-8: du nyan pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyang
T02D1794:164a-9: the tshom skye bar byed pa yin na /
T02D1794:164a-10: nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la sogs
T02D1794:164a-11: pa gzhan lta ci smos zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1794:164a-12: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'dus pa'i don rnyed par dka' ba yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1794:164a-13: rgyan bdun rtogs par dka' bas na //
T02D1794:164a-14: zhes pa smos te rgyan bdun rtogs par dka' bas de'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:164a-16: thams cad du ni rnam par 'khor //
T02D1794:164a-18: 'di nyid kyang gzhung 'di nyid las bzhugs pa'i tshogs nas brtsams te /
T02D1794:164a-19: mtha' rnam pa drug dang rnam pa bzhir bshad pa
T02D1794:164a-20: 'dis gsang ba 'dus pa'i don phyag rgyas btab pa
T02D1794:164a-21: yin la zhes smos pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1794:164a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa lung bstan pa'i rgyud las /
T02D1794:164a-23: gsang ba'i bdag po don rgyas pa'i //
T02D1794:164a-24: tshul chen 'di ni rnyed gyur nas //
T02D1794:164a-25: ji bzhin don ni rnyed bzung ba //
T02D1794:164a-26: des na lam ngan dag tu ltung //
T02D1794:164a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:164a-28: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
T02D1794:164a-29: ba 'dus pa shes par bya ba yin par bstan
T02D1794:164a-30: pa'i phyir / de bas bla ma'i bka' drin gyis //
T02D1794:164a-31: 'bad de rnam par shes nas ni //
T02D1794:164a-32: zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
T02D1794:164a-33: ba 'dus pa ni dbang dang dam tshig dang mi
T02D1794:164a-34: ldan pa la gsang ba ston par byed pa dang
T02D1794:164a-35: / slob dpon smod par byed pa dang /
T02D1794:164a-36: slob dpon gyi gdams ngag rjes su mi 'dzin pa dang nyan thos kyi rigs can dang /
T02D1794:164a-37: rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs can dang /
T02D1794:164a-38: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can dang /
T02D1794:164a-39: rigs ma nges pa la sogs pa rnams kyis nam yang rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing /
T02D1794:164b-0: bla ma'i gdams dag rjes @164b su 'dzin par byed pa dang /
T02D1794:164b-1: dad pa dang dam tshig la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1794:164b-2: theg pa chen po'i rigs can gyi gang zag rgyu'i rgyud kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D1794:164b-3: de nas gzhan la chos bstan par 'dod nas bshad pa'i dbye bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1794:164b-4: sems can rjes su gzung 'dod pas//
T02D1794:164b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1794:164b-6: bla ma'i gdams ngag la brten nas /
T02D1794:164b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'dus pa'i don ji
T02D1794:164b-8: lta bu rnam par shes pa'i gang zag des ma
T02D1794:164b-9: 'ongs pa'i sems can blo dman pa rjes su gzung
T02D1794:164b-10: bar bya ba'i phyir bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su
T02D1794:164b-12: de'i rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba smos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:164b-13: 'dis rgyan bdun bshad par dam bcas pa yang yin no //
T02D1794:164b-14: de nyid kyi dbye ba mdor bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1794:164b-15: gleng bslang ba yi grangs ni lnga //
T02D1794:164b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1794:164b-17: gleng bslang pa yang yin la /
T02D1794:164b-18: lnga yang yin pas gleng bslang ba lnga'o //
T02D1794:164b-19: rigs pa yang ni rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1794:164b-20: zhes pa rigs pa ni 'thad pa ste /
T02D1794:164b-21: 'thad pa'i chos rnam pa bzhi zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D1794:164b-22: rgyas bshad mtha' ni rnam pa drug / ces pa bsdus pa'i bshad pa ni ma yin gyi /
T02D1794:164b-23: 'dir rgyas pa'i bshad pa kho na'o //
T02D1794:164b-24: rgyas par bshad pa yang yin la //
T02D1794:164b-25: mtha' drug kyang yin pas 'dir rgyas bshad mtha' drug go //
T02D1794:164b-26: bshad pa yang ni rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1794:164b-27: zhes pa bshad pa ni bstan pa ste /
T02D1794:164b-28: bstan pa'i chos rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o //
T02D1794:164b-29: lnga pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis //
T02D1794:164b-30: zhes pa'i lnga pa ni lnga pa ste grangs kyi lnga pa'o //
T02D1794:164b-31: de'i dbye ba gnyis ni tshogs dang /
T02D1794:164b-32: slob ma'i bye brag gis so //
T02D1794:164b-33: drug pa'i dbye ba lnga dang ldan //
T02D1794:164b-34: zhes pa ni tshogs kyi dang slob ma'i gnas skabs kyi dbye ba yin no //
T02D1794:164b-35: bdun pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis te //
T02D1794:164b-36: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas don mtha' dag bden pa rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa'o //
T02D1794:164b-37: 'di dag gis ni mdor bsdus par bstan pa'o //
T02D1794:164b-38: rgyan rnams mdor bsdus pa'o zhes bstan pa 'dis ni
T02D1794:164b-39: rgyan rgyas par bstan pa ni ma yin no zhes
T02D1794:164b-40: so // rgyas par yang gang zhig las shes par bya zhe na /
T02D1794:164b-41: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D1794:164b-42: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1794:165a-1: lha mo bzhis zhus pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1794:165a-2: de'i rjes su 'brangs nas bdag gis bshad ces sbyar ro //
T02D1794:165a-4: rgyan ni bdun po rnams kyi ni //
T02D1794:165a-5: rim pa bzhin du re re yi //
T02D1794:165a-6: rgyas pa dag ni bdag gis bya //
T02D1794:165a-7: zhes pa gleng bslang ba'i grangs rgyas pa dang /
T02D1794:165a-8: rigs pa rgyas par bshad pa dang /
T02D1794:165a-9: mtha' drug rgyas pa bshad pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1794:165a-10: de la dang po gleng bslang ba'i grangs rgyas par bshad pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1794:165a-13: dri ba bstan pa'i phyir rgyud 'di'i ming ni ci zhig yin //
T02D1794:165a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1794:165a-15: ming med pa dang ming ma yin pa dang /
T02D1794:165a-16: ming log pa rnams bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1794:165a-17: rgyud 'di'i ming ni ci zhig yin zhes smos te /
T02D1794:165a-19: dgos pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D1794:165a-20: dgos pa log pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D1794:165a-21: gang gi don du 'di nyid mdzad //
T02D1794:165a-23: byed pa po med pa dang /
T02D1794:165a-24: byed pa po ma yin pa dang /
T02D1794:165a-25: byed pa po log pa bsal ba'i don du /
T02D1794:165a-26: su zhig byed pa po zhes 'dri ba'o //
T02D1794:165a-28: ma yin pa la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /
T02D1794:165a-30: de nyid bshad pa dang po'i lan du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1794:165a-31: rgyud kyi mtshan ni ming yin la //
T02D1794:165a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D1794:165a-34: dang thugs gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1794:165a-35: sogs pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi ming ji snyed pa'o //
T02D1794:165a-36: de bas na gang la de dag gi rtags su 'brel te /
T02D1794:165a-37: 'di'i ming gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02D1794:165a-38: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid yin zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1794:165a-39: gsang ba 'dus pa 'di gang gi don du mdzad ces pa'i lan du /
T02D1794:165a-40: skye bo 'dod can don du mdzad //
T02D1794:165a-42: gong du bshad pa nyid dang 'og nas kyang legs par ston pa nyid kyi phyir ma bshad do //
T02D1794:165a-43: 'di'i byed pa po gang zhig yin zhes pa'i lan du /
T02D1794:165a-44: 'di'i don byed pa po rdo rje sems dpa' zhes smos te /

T02D1794:172a-33: slob ma'i dbye ba la gnyis yod pas na /

T02D1794:172a-37: tshogs la bshad pa ston pa dang //
T02D1794:172a-38: gnyis pa slob ma la bshad pa'o //
T02D1794:172a-39: zhes smos te de la tshogs la bshad pa ni
T02D1794:172a-40: gang zhig yin ci'i phyir tshogs la bshad pa zhes
T02D1794:172a-41: bya zhe na / ji bzhin sgra dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1794:172a-42: ji bzhin pa'i sgra ni ji bzhin pa'i sgra'o //
T02D1794:172a-43: de bzhin du spyi'i don gyi bar ni tshogs la bshad pa'o //
T02D1794:172a-45: de de'i snod du gyur pa'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:172a-46: slob ma la bshad pa du zhig / ci'i phyir slob ma la bshad pa //
T02D1794:172a-48: ji bzhin min sgra zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1794:172a-49: ji bzhin min pa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga po 'di ni slob ma la bshad pa'o //
T02D1794:172a-51: de de'i snod yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:172b-0: de @172b ltar bshad pa rnam pa gnyis bstan nas /
T02D1794:172b-1: da ni gang zag gi dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1794:172b-2: rnam pa kun du nyan 'dod pa'i //
T02D1794:172b-3: zhes gsungs te dus dang rnam pa thams cad du
T02D1794:172b-4: nyan par 'dod pa'i gang zag ces pa'i don to
T02D1794:172b-6: blo yi rnam pa dpag med las //
T02D1794:172b-7: gang zag rnam pa lngar 'dod do //
T02D1794:172b-9: 'di ltar rigs kyi dbang du dpag tu med de /
T02D1794:172b-10: dpe'i dbang du rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1794:172b-11: lnga po nyid gang yin sus gsungs she na /
T02D1794:172b-14: rang bzhin tha dad ming gis te /
T02D1794:172b-15: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin //
T02D1794:172b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1794:172b-17: de la autpala zhes bya ba'i gang zag ni gang
T02D1794:172b-18: zhig / ci'i phyir autpala gyi gang zag tu brtag
T02D1794:172b-20: de ni ma lus thos gyur la //
T02D1794:172b-21: 'dzin pa la ni rnam par mkhas //
T02D1794:172b-22: zhes smos te bka' dang bstan bcos thams cad ma
T02D1794:172b-23: lus par thos pa ni ma lus par thos pa'o
T02D1794:172b-24: // 'dzin pa la ni rnam par mkhas //
T02D1794:172b-25: zhes pa ni thos pa tsam gyis thams cad khong du chud pa'o //
T02D1794:172b-26: skad cig tsam gyis brjed 'gyur ba //
T02D1794:172b-27: zhes pa ni bla ma dang bral ba tsam gyis brjed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1794:172b-29: autpala zhes bya ba'i gang zag go //
T02D1794:172b-31: autpala dang 'dra bas autpala lta bu'i gang zag go //
T02D1794:172b-32: autpala zhes bya ba 'di la mthun pa'i chos ci yod ce na /
T02D1794:172b-33: ji srid du autpala zhes bya ba 'di ni nyi
T02D1794:172b-34: ma shar ba'i tshe na kha 'bye bar 'gyur gyi
T02D1794:172b-35: / gang gi tshe nub par gyur pa'i dus na
T02D1794:172b-36: ni gang la 'bye bar 'gyur ba'i chos med do
T02D1794:172b-37: / // pad dkar zhes bya ba'i gang zag 'di yang ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02D1794:172b-38: gzung bya mang du thos gyur kyang //
T02D1794:172b-39: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dpag tu med pa thos par gyur kyang zhes pa'o //
T02D1794:172b-40: ston pa yis ni nus med pa //
T02D1794:172b-41: zhes pa ni bsam pa dang brjod pa dang bral zhes pa'o //
T02D1794:172b-42: bum pa'i ras bal sa bon 'dra //
T02D1794:172b-44: bum pa'i nang du ras bal gyi sa bon bcug pa bstan du med pa bzhin no //
T02D1794:172b-45: pad dkar lta bu'i gang zag go //
T02D1794:172b-46: zhes pa ni padma dkar po la chus mi chags pa bzhin no //
T02D1794:173a-0: padma zhes bya ba'i gang zag kyang @173a * //
T02D1794:173a-2: dad dang ldan zhing snying rje shes //
T02D1794:173a-3: zhes pa la sogs pa ni ldan zhes bya ba kun la sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D1794:173a-4: dad pa dang ldan pa ni 'dod pa dang /
T02D1794:173a-7: de dang gang ldan pa ni de rnams dang ma bral ba ste de nyid dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1794:173a-8: snying rje dang ldan pa ni snying rje chen po dang ma bral ba'o //
T02D1794:173a-9: shes rab dang ldan pa ni shes rab chen po dang ma bral ba'o //
T02D1794:173a-10: thos nas blo yi kha bye la //
T02D1794:173a-11: zhes pa ni blo rgya chen por gyur zhes pa'o //
T02D1794:173a-12: tshigs med 'od ma bzhin nyan pa //
T02D1794:173a-13: zhes pa ni tshigs pa med pa'i 'od ma gas po ltar nyan zhes pa'o //
T02D1794:173a-14: 'dis ni dus thams cad du nyan par byed cing
T02D1794:173a-15: sgom pa dang bshad pa la sogs pa spangs zhes
T02D1794:173a-16: sbyar ro // 'di nyid ming ci yin zhe na /
T02D1794:173a-17: padma zhes bya ba'i gang zag go zhes smos te /
T02D1794:173a-18: tshigs med pa ni dper na padma gas pa lta bu'o zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1794:173a-19: tsandan lta bu'i gang zag ces bya ba 'di yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02D1794:173a-20: thos pa nyung zhing nga rgyal ldan //
T02D1794:173a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1794:173a-22: thos pa nyung ba ni ma thos pa'o //
T02D1794:173a-23: nga rgyal ldan pa ni bdag thos pa dang ldan pa yin zhes smra ba'o //
T02D1794:173a-24: rtsa ba med par mang du smra //
T02D1794:173a-25: zhes pa ni nges pa'i shes pa ma skyes par sna tshogs pa smra zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1794:173a-26: rjes su gzung bar mi nus pa //
T02D1794:173a-27: zhes pa ni phyis rang gis 'dzin par mi nus pa'o //
T02D1794:173a-28: de nyid kyi ming ci zhe na /
T02D1794:173a-29: tsandan zhes bya ba'i gang zag go zhes smra ste /
T02D1794:173a-30: tsandan dang 'dra bas tsandan lta bu'i gang zag ste ri ma la ya'i tsandan lta bu'o //
T02D1794:173a-31: nga rgyal ldan zhes pa ni dbyar gyi (dus kyi tsandan lta bu'o/) zhes pa'o //
T02D1794:173a-32: rtsa ba med par mang du smra //
T02D1794:173a-33: zhes pa 'dis ni ba do la'i ri'i tsandan lta bu'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1794:173a-34: rjes su bzung bar mi nus pa //
T02D1794:173a-35: zhes pa ni tsandan sbrul gyi snying po can lta bu'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1794:173a-36: 'di dag gis ni tsandan lta bu'i gang zag bstan to //
T02D1794:173a-37: de nas rin po che lta bu'i gad zag bstan te /
T02D1794:173a-38: tshul khrims dag cing mkhas la sgrin //
T02D1794:173a-39: zhes pa ni bslab pa rnam pa gsum gyi tshul khrims dang /
T02D1794:173a-40: dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T02D1794:173a-41: sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T02D1794:173a-42: 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D1794:173b-0: gang gi tshul @173b khrims la skyon med pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:173b-1: mkhas pa ni mkhas pa ste /
T02D1794:173b-2: gang gis gang gi bya ba thams cad la thogs pa med pa de la mkhas pa'o //
T02D1794:173b-3: shes rab ldan pa ni shes rab dang ldan pa
T02D1794:173b-4: ste shes rab mchog dang ma bral zhes pa'i tha
T02D1794:173b-5: tshig go // rgyud gcig las thos nas legs par
T02D1794:173b-6: ston pa ni yang dag pa'i gdams ngag ma nor
T02D1794:173b-7: bar thos shing de nyid dang 'brel pa'i bya ba
T02D1794:173b-8: byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:173b-9: 'di nyid kyi ming ci yin zhe na /
T02D1794:173b-10: rin chen lta bu'i gang zag go //
T02D1794:173b-11: zhes pa ste dper na rin po che'i bum pa lta bu'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1794:173b-13: bden gnyis rnam par nges byas te //
T02D1794:173b-14: zhes pa ni thams cad kyang don dam pa'i bden pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden par 'dus pa'o //
T02D1794:173b-15: 'dir rgyan bdun yin pas na rgyan bdun no //
T02D1794:173b-16: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub pa'o //
T02D1794:173b-17: zhes pa 'di ni zung du 'jug pa 'ba' zhig gi dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D1794:173b-18: bshad smra shin tu rnyed par dka' //
T02D1794:173b-19: zhes pa ste bshad pa po dang smra ba po
T02D1794:173b-20: shin tu rnyed par dka' zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1794:173b-21: // rnyed par dka' ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1794:173b-22: rnal 'byor rgyud las gzhan du min //
T02D1794:173b-23: zhes bya ba smos te rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kho
T02D1794:173b-24: na las rnyed kyi gzhan las rnyed pa ma yin
T02D1794:173b-25: no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1794:173b-26: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02D1794:173b-27: zhes pa ni gong ma dang 'brel to //
T02D1794:173b-28: gleng gzhi rim pa sbyor bar bcas //
T02D1794:173b-29: zhes pa ni gleng bslang ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1794:173b-30: rgyan rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i rigs pa'o zhes pa
T02D1794:173b-31: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud thams
T02D1794:173b-32: cad ni rgyan rnam pa bdun gyi 'ching pa bcings
T02D1794:173b-33: la rgyud shes par 'dod pas kyang de la bslab
T02D1794:173b-34: par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1794:173b-35: rgyan rnam pa bdun yang yin la bshad pa'i rigs
T02D1794:173b-36: pa yang yin na de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1794:173b-37: // sgron ma gsal ba zhes bya ba'i 'grel bshad
T02D1794:173b-38: las rgyan rnam pa bdun spros pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D1794:173b-40: / de ltar rgyan rnam pa bdun go rims bzhin du bshad nas /
T02D1794:173b-41: da ni le'u bcu bdun po nyid kyis bsdus pa'i
T02D1794:173b-42: don bshad par 'dod nas da ni zhes bya ba
T02D1794:173b-43: la sogs pa'i gzhung gi tshogs gsungs te /
T02D1794:173b-44: da ni zhes bya ba ni skabs la bab pa'i tshig go //
T02D1794:174a-0: @174a * // le'u bcu bdun gyi bsdus pa'i don bshad par bya
T02D1794:174a-1: ste zhes bya ba la le'u bcu bdun ni le'u
T02D1794:174a-2: bcu bdun te gzhung gi tshogs kyi rim par phye
T02D1794:174a-3: ba bcu bdun yod pa de la de skad ces
T02D1794:174a-4: bya'o // le'u bcu bdun zhes pa ni bcu bdun
T02D1794:174a-5: kho na ste 'di dag gis ni mang ba'am nyung
T02D1794:174a-6: ba rnam par bkag pa bstan to //
T02D1794:174a-7: ci'i phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1794:174a-8: kyi gsang ba 'dus pa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas
T02D1794:174a-9: pa ni 'di nyid kyis ston par 'gyur gyi gzhan
T02D1794:174a-11: 'on te ma yin na yang lam 'bras bu dang bcas par ston par nam yang mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1794:174a-12: 'o na le'u dang po las ni ci zhig gang gi phyir ston zhe na /
T02D1794:174a-13: le'u dang po las ni zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1794:174a-14: le'u dang po ni thog ma zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1794:174a-15: thog ma'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1794:174a-16: de las ci ston zhe na rjod par byed pa
T02D1794:174a-17: dang brjod par bya ba ni sgra'i tshogs dang don
T02D1794:174a-18: gyi tshogs so // de'i bdag nyid kyang gang yin zhe na /
T02D1794:174a-19: bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes smos te brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid kyang yin la /
T02D1794:174a-20: rdo rje 'chang chen po yang yin pas de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:174a-21: de'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor yang gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02D1794:174a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa'i lha sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
T02D1794:174a-23: der nyan pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa ni tshogs kyi gang zag dang slob ma'i gang zag go //
T02D1794:174a-24: de la yang ci byed ce na /
T02D1794:174a-25: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba byin nas zhes smos te /
T02D1794:174a-26: rig pa'i dbang ni rig pa'i dbang ste /
T02D1794:174a-27: slob ma'i rig pa'i dbang ni 'di ltar chu la sogs pa'o //
T02D1794:174a-28: yang na rig pa dang bcas pa las byung bas
T02D1794:174a-29: rig pa'i dbang ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1794:174a-31: yang na rig pa'i lha mo dang 'brel bas rig
T02D1794:174a-32: pa'i dbang ste shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo
T02D1794:174a-33: // yang na rig pa thob pas na rig pa'i
T02D1794:174a-34: dbang ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
T02D1794:174a-36: de la dang po'i dbang ni tshogs la sbyin pa'o //
T02D1794:174a-37: lhag ma gsum ni slob ma'i gang zag la sbyin pa'o //
T02D1794:174a-38: dbang byin nas kyang ci byed ce na /
T02D1794:174a-39: dbang dang rjes su 'brel ba'i man ngag ston pa ste /
T02D1794:174b-0: de'i phyir @174b drang ba dang nges pa'i don zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1794:174b-1: drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don la brtag pa ni gong du bstan pa nyid do //
T02D1794:174b-2: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub
T02D1794:174b-3: pa'i thabs so sor ston cing zhes pa ni dbang
T02D1794:174b-4: rnam pa gnyis bskur ba'i gang zag de dang de
T02D1794:174b-5: la bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i
T02D1794:174b-6: sgrub pa'i thabs ma 'dres par ston to //
T02D1794:174b-7: 'dir gang la bum pa'i dbang bskur ba de dang
T02D1794:174b-8: de la ni bskyed pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig nye
T02D1794:174b-9: bar bstan to // gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba la
T02D1794:174b-10: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
T02D1794:174b-11: spyod pa spros te ston to //
T02D1794:174b-12: de bzhin du rdo rje bzlas pa dang sems la dmigs pa 'ba' zhig kyang nye bar bstan to //
T02D1794:174b-13: de bzhin du sgyu ma lta bu'i sku yang nye bar bstan to //
T02D1794:174b-14: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba la ni
T02D1794:174b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od gsal ba
T02D1794:174b-16: dang zung du 'jug pa 'ba' zhig nye bar bstan
T02D1794:174b-17: to // le'u dang po las de nyid ston nas gzhan dag las kyang ston zhe na /
T02D1794:174b-18: gzhan dag las kyang ston pa bstan pa'i phyir 'og
T02D1794:174b-19: nas bshad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos
T02D1794:174b-20: te / 'og nas bshad pa ni le 'u gnyis
T02D1794:174b-21: pa la sogs pa ste gong ma ma yin pa
T02D1794:174b-23: le'u bcu drug po ni dang po las gzhan pa'i
T02D1794:174b-24: le'u bcu drug po kho na zhes pa'i don to
T02D1794:174b-25: // de'i don gzhan dag kyang rnyed pa ni rdzogs
T02D1794:174b-26: pa'i rim pa dang phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1794:174b-27: sogs pa yang 'dir rnyed ces sbyar ro //
T02D1794:174b-28: de la yang 'di las gzhan pa zhig yin nam zhe na ma yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1794:174b-29: lha'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis po nyid la 'jug cing zhes pa smos te /
T02D1794:174b-30: lha'i rnal 'byor gnyis ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis so //
T02D1794:174b-31: 'di la gang gis ting nge 'dzin gyi yul du byed pa de ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1794:174b-32: rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis po 'di nyid kyang gang la shes shing bshad ce na /
T02D1794:174b-33: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs so zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1794:174b-34: gsang ba 'dus pa'i don de nyid gzhan yin no
T02D1794:174b-35: zhe na ma yin pa'i phyir don 'di nyid ces
T02D1794:175a-0: smos te / 'di nyid nye bar ston te gzhan ni ma yin zhes shugs kyis @175a * //
T02D1794:175a-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa /
T02D1794:175a-4: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang
T02D1794:175a-5: chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa'i gzhung
T02D1794:175a-7: rim pa gnyis la yang dag gnas //
T02D1794:175a-8: zhes pa ni de thams cad kyang rim pa gnyis su 'dus zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1794:175a-9: rim pa gnyis nyid gang yin zhe na /
T02D1794:175a-10: bskyed pa yi ni rim pa dang /
T02D1794:175a-11: zhes smos te bskyed pa'i rim pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ste /
T02D1794:175a-12: gang gis blos bskyed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:175a-13: bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni de las skyes pa'i sku'o //
T02D1794:175a-14: yang na bskyed pa'i rim pa ni lha'i rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig pa'o //
T02D1794:175a-15: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig pa'o //
T02D1794:175a-16: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
T02D1794:175a-17: ba'i mdzod ces bya ba las gsungs te bcom ldan
T02D1794:175a-18: 'das bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba de gang
T02D1794:175a-19: lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1794:175a-20: sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1794:175a-21: kyi bskyed pa'i rim pa ni rten du gyur pa
T02D1794:175a-22: nyid do // bcom ldan lhan 'das rten tu gyur pa zhes bya ba de gang lags /
T02D1794:175a-23: sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i rten du gyur pa'o //
T02D1794:175a-24: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba de gang lags /
T02D1794:175a-25: de'i rten zhes bya ba de gang lags /
T02D1794:175a-26: sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1794:175a-27: kyi gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba de ni
T02D1794:175a-28: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams
T02D1794:175a-29: kyi yul ma yin pa tshogs kyi gang zag gi
T02D1794:175a-30: yang yul ma yin pa shin tu rmad du byung
T02D1794:175a-31: ba theg pa chen po'i rigs can gyi spyod yul
T02D1794:175a-32: du gyur pa'o // sems dpa' chen po de'i rten
T02D1794:175a-33: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i
T02D1794:175a-34: sku shin tu rmad du byung pa'o //
T02D1794:175a-35: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1794:175a-36: bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba de gang lags
T02D1794:175a-37: / sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1794:175a-38: cad kyi bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1794:175a-39: gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba phra mo'i ting
T02D1794:175a-40: nge 'dzin to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o//
T02D1794:175b-0: @175b nyid ces bya ba ni kho na zhes pa ste /
T02D1794:175b-1: 'dir gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //

T02D1794:198b-51: gang gi dus su sgra gtan la phab nas phyis
T02D1794:198b-52: don gzhan du gtan la 'bebs pa'i dus su gang
T02D1794:198b-53: gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa de de
T02D1794:198b-54: la zhes bya ba la sogs pas kun du gtan
T02D1794:198b-56: 'di dag gis ni spas pa'i don bstan to //
T02D1794:198b-57: yang lung gis bshad pa zhes pa ni mthar thug pa'i don bshad par 'dod pas so //
T02D1794:198b-59: gang gis gang du brtag par bya ba dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1794:198b-60: rgyud ni 'di skad bdag gis thos //
T02D1794:198b-61: zhes pa ni spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D1794:198b-62: gsal ba 'ga' zhig dus yin te //
T02D1794:198b-63: zhes pa ni gang gis gang zhig yongs su gsal bar gyur pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:198b-64: rdo rje gsang ba ni sems gsum nyid de /
T02D1794:198b-66: rdo rje dam tshig ni gsang ba gsum lugs las bzlog pa dang ldan pa nyid de /
T02D1794:198b-67: ye shes nyid de de bzhin gshegs pas na ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D1794:198b-68: ye shes phun tshogs bsam mi khyab //
T02D1794:199a-1: rgyas kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1794:199a-2: yod med gnyi ga las 'das pa //
T02D1794:199a-3: zhes pa ni gang gis gang zhig spangs par gur
T02D1794:199a-4: pa de'i phyir de la rag las par gyur pa'i
T02D1794:199a-5: chos de yang yongs su spangs pa'o //
T02D1794:199a-6: de la gnas med gnas pa ni gnas dang gnas pa'i rtog pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1794:199a-7: nam mkha'i rang bzhin ni 'dus ma byas pa ste chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
T02D1794:199a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa ni sangs rgyas te de'i ye shes ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes so //
T02D1794:199a-9: des 'di yul du byed pa ni sgom pa'o //
T02D1794:199a-10: bzhugs pa zhes bya ba yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1794:199a-11: 'gro snying rnam dag ste chos thams cad kyi de
T02D1794:199a-12: bzhin nyid la bzhugs pa ni gnas par mdzad pa'o
T02D1794:199a-13: // de bas na bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1794:199a-14: pa'i tha snyad thams cad kyang don dam pa la
T02D1794:199a-15: 'jug par bya ba yin gyi don dam par brjod
T02D1794:199a-16: pa'i phyir ni ma yin no zhes bshad do //
T02D1794:199a-18: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
T02D1794:199a-19: 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni gang
T02D1794:199a-20: gis ji ltar yongs su bstan pa'i phyir zhes pa'o
T02D1794:199a-21: // zhugs pa'i tshig nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni tha ma smos pa nyid do //
T02D1794:199a-22: rgyud ma lus pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa ni rgyud
T02D1794:199a-23: ma lus pa'i don bstan pas te 'dis mjug bsdu
T02D1794:199a-24: ba bstan to // de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba
T02D1794:199a-25: la sogs pas ni 'di nyid kyi yan lag bstan
T02D1794:199a-26: ba bstan to // par bya'o // 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang grangs ji lta tsam zhe na /
T02D1794:199a-27: brjod kyis mi lang bzhes bya'o //
T02D1794:199a-28: de bshad pa bgrang ba las 'das pa ni bgrang du med pa'o //
T02D1794:199a-29: gang zhig kun du bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:199a-30: 'o na lan gnyis smos pas ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D1794:199a-31: gzugs dang yon tan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te 'di dag dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1794:199a-33: gang gis gang zhig kun du snang bar gyur pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:199a-35: de nas gang gis gang zhig yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ni /
T02D1794:199a-36: gang gis lha'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa ste de nyid do //
T02D1794:199a-37: dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba gang zhig yin
T02D1794:199a-38: zhe na don yod par grub pa'o zhes gang zhig
T02D1794:199a-39: yongs su grub pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1794:199a-40: // 'o na sgrib pa rnam par sel ba la
T02D1794:199a-41: ci'i phyir dam tshig rdo rje'i sgrar brjod ce na
T02D1794:199a-42: // / 'dir de'i rigs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1794:199b-0: 'dir don yod grub pa'i @199b rigs dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:199b-1: de bas na gcig ni dngos su brjod pa nyid do //
T02D1794:199b-2: gcig ni btags nas bstan pa nyid do //
T02D1794:199b-3: rigs gzhan yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1794:199b-4: 'di dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor bstan to //
T02D1794:199b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor kho na las ma gsungs sam zhe na ma yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1794:199b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'ba' zhig dang lhan cig
T02D1794:199b-7: bzhugs par ma zad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1794:199b-8: pa smos te / 'o na gang dang bzhugs she na /
T02D1794:199b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang yang lhan cig tu
T02D1794:199b-10: bzhugs pa ste bgrang ba las 'das zhes bya ba
T02D1794:199b-13: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi yan lag gi
T02D1794:199b-14: cha shas su gyur pa zhes pa ni 'khor thams
T02D1794:199b-15: cad gtso bo las tha dad du 'jug par mi
T02D1794:199b-16: 'gyur te / gang gi phyir gang zhig gang las
T02D1794:199b-17: tha dad du med par 'gyur ba de'i phyir de
T02D1794:199b-20: 'di nyid las zhes pa gsang ba 'dus pa'o //
T02D1794:199b-21: mdor na zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad zin to //
T02D1794:199b-22: de bas na zhes pa ni de'i phyir zhes pa'o //
T02D1794:199b-23: bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1794:199b-24: rang gi sku'i dkyil 'khor spros nas zhes pa ni rang gi 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1794:199b-26: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lta bus 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir zhes pa'o //
T02D1794:199b-27: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su bzhugs //
T02D1794:199b-28: zhes pa ni go bar mdzad do //
T02D1794:199b-29: de ltar zhes pa ni mjug bsdu ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1794:199b-30: da ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'dod
T02D1794:199b-31: chags chen po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan
T02D1794:199b-33: 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags rab tu spang bar bya'i
T02D1794:199b-34: phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin
T02D1794:199b-35: to // bshad ma thag pa ni gong du bshad pa nyid do //
T02D1794:199b-36: rang gi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi lcags kyus
T02D1794:199b-37: drangs zhes pa ni snying gnas phyung ste slar bsdu
T02D1794:199b-38: bas bsdus zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1794:199b-39: 'di yang gang gi phyir gang zhig la byung nas
T02D1794:199b-40: gang du gnas par 'gyur ba de la de skad
T02D1794:199b-41: ces bya'o // de nas ci byed ce na bcom
T02D1794:199b-42: ldan 'das mchog tu dga' ba'i bde bas tshim par
T02D1794:199b-43: bya ba'i phyir zhes pa ni gang gi bde bas
T02D1794:199b-44: gang zhig gang du gnas par 'gyur ba de la
T02D1794:200a-0: gnas skabs snga ma ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems @200a * //
T02D1794:200a-1: dpa'i dkyil 'khor te gang gis de yongs su spangs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:200a-3: lha'i bu mo'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas zhes
T02D1794:200a-4: pa ni gang gis lha'i bu mo gang dang 'dra
T02D1794:200a-5: bar kun du mdzes par gyur pa gang yin pa
T02D1794:200a-6: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:200a-7: lha'i bu mo'i gzugs snang ba yang gang dang gang
T02D1794:200a-8: yin zhe na sa'i khams ni sangs rgyas spyan lta
T02D1794:200a-9: bu'o zhes pa ni sa rdo rje las tha dad
T02D1794:200a-10: du gnas pa'o // 'dir sa'i khams nyid sangs rgyas
T02D1794:200a-11: spyan lta bu'o zhes pa ni gang zhig gang las
T02D1794:200a-13: yang na 'dir sa'i khams ni sangs rgyas spyan nyid
T02D1794:200a-14: ces pa ni gang zhig dang 'brel pa de la
T02D1794:200a-17: 'dod chags kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas
T02D1794:200a-18: gang zhig nyon mongs pa dang bral ba gang yin
T02D1794:200a-20: 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa yang gang yin zhe na nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1794:200a-22: gzhan yang gang zhig phyi rol gyi de bzhin gshegs
T02D1794:200a-23: pa'i 'khor de dag tu dmigs zhes pa la sogs
T02D1794:200a-24: pa'i don ni // gang gis gang zhig gang du
T02D1794:200a-25: 'dzin pa de dang de spangs bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D1794:200a-26: pa'i don ni // zhes pa'o // bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D1794:200a-27: zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po dang sangs rgyas thams cad tha dad du med ces pa'o //
T02D1794:200a-28: rgyal sras thams cad nyid kyang yin //
T02D1794:200a-29: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdag por gyur
T02D1794:200a-30: pa yang yin zhes pa ste tha dad du med
T02D1794:200a-31: pa yin no // nges pa ni ma nor ba'o //
T02D1794:200a-32: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dgos pa bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D1794:200a-33: da ni rgyud 'di la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1794:200a-34: sems gtso bo yin pa ni ting nge 'dzin gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:200a-35: mi bskyod pa ni thugs kyi ngo bo'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:200a-37: sems snang ba dang bcas pa gang gi ting nge
T02D1794:200a-38: 'dzin gyi yan lag gis sbyangs pas thob pa de
T02D1794:200a-39: ni de'i rigs te de bas na de gtso bor
T02D1794:200a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1794:200a-42: don ni gang gis chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang
T02D1794:200a-43: du bhr'um la sogs ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal
T02D1794:200a-44: yas khang phyi dang nang shin tu gsal ba ji
T02D1794:200a-45: ltar smos pa'i rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa shin
T02D1794:200a-46: tu mdzes pa blta sdug pa'i ngo bo nyid do
T02D1794:200a-47: zhes bstan to // de lta bu'i gzhal yas khang
T02D1794:200a-48: gi dbus su lhag par mos pa lha lnga'i rnam
T02D1794:200a-49: par bsgoms te slar rang la gzhug go //
T02D1794:200b-0: @200b padma 'dab ma bzhir ldan pa'i rigs lnga bskyed pa yang dag bsgom //
T02D1794:200b-2: nges pa'i don du bshad pa /
T02D1794:200b-3: rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1794:200b-4: zhes pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid dag pas der gyur pa'o //
T02D1794:200b-5: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i bar du ste 'di ltar phung po dang /
T02D1794:200b-6: khams dang skye mched thams cad rang gi shes pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1794:200b-7: de nyid ye nas spros pa dang bral zhing ma
T02D1794:200b-8: skyes pa'i rang bzhin thogs pa med pas sangs rgyas
T02D1794:200b-9: thams cad kyis bsten par bya ba'i phyir btsun mo'o
T02D1794:200b-10: // yongs su dag phyir gsal pa'o //
T02D1794:200b-11: 'od zer thams cad kyi rang bzhin pas na sna tshogs kun du rgyas so //
T02D1794:200b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin pas na de'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D1794:200b-13: snang ba las byung ba dang /
T02D1794:200b-14: de'i rang bzhin pas na gsal pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1794:200b-15: 'dis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyi skur bshad nas /
T02D1794:200b-16: de nas sems can thams cad dang byang chub sems
T02D1794:200b-17: dpa' la ji skad du bshad pa'i sku nyid gsal
T02D1794:200b-18: bar snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1794:200b-19: // nam mkha' kun ni don dam pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
T02D1794:200b-20: de'i ngang la rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bzhugs
T02D1794:200b-21: pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang
T02D1794:200b-22: bral ba'i tshul du byas pa'o //
T02D1794:200b-23: don 'di nyid ni bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid do //
T02D1794:200b-24: de gsal bar bya ba ni bstan pa dang bshad pa'i rim pas so //
T02D1794:200b-25: 'das pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad
T02D1794:200b-26: pa'i don ni gang gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
T02D1794:200b-27: thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can rdo rje sems
T02D1794:200b-28: dpa' sa bon la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis skye ba
T02D1794:200b-29: dang sdud pa'i tshul bstan pa nyid do //
T02D1794:200b-30: rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ni de'i dgos pa bstan to /
T02D1794:200b-31: ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag gis bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgoms na zhes bya ba nyid do //
T02D1794:200b-32: rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra par 'gyur bar dgongs so //
T02D1794:200b-33: phung po la sogs pa ni yul dang dbang po thams cad do //
T02D1794:200b-34: kun rdzob byang chub sems ni khu ba ste zag pa med pa'i bde ba skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:200b-35: gcig tu mdzad pa ni des mi rtog pa'i ye shes skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:200b-37: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1794:200b-38: rtsa phran stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni byang
T02D1794:200b-39: chub kyi sems kyi sa bon gnas pa'i rtsa ba
T02D1794:200b-40: ste / de rlung la sogs pa'i rim pas byang
T02D1794:200b-41: chub kyi sems phab pas zag pa med pa'i bde
T02D1794:200b-42: ba yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1794:201a-0: @201a * // dbang po gnyis ni rdo rje dang padma ste skye ba la dbang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:201a-2: 'dod chags chen po'i me ste gang la sems chen
T02D1794:201a-3: po dang ting nge 'dzin du ldan pa yod pa
T02D1794:201a-4: de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:201a-5: mchog tu dga' ba ni nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1794:201a-6: 'di ni dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i snang ba gsum mo //
T02D1794:201a-7: don dam pa'i bden pas gcig tu mdzad pa ni
T02D1794:201a-8: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes kyi
T02D1794:201a-9: rang bzhin med par gyur pa'o //
T02D1794:201a-10: stong pa nyid gsum ni gong du bshad pa'o //
T02D1794:201a-11: thams cad stong pa ni mthar thug pa nyid do //
T02D1794:201a-12: de ltar lhag par mos pas zhes bya ba ni
T02D1794:201a-13: drad ba dang spyi'i don du bshad pa yin gyi
T02D1794:201a-14: thams cad kyi ni ma yin no //
T02D1794:201a-15: yongs su dag pa dang yongs su ma dag pa ni slob pa dang mi slob pa dang /
T02D1794:201a-16: shes bya'i sgrib pa mtha' dag spangs pa dang ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:201a-17: de la gtso bo ni yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1794:201a-18: lhag ma ni yongs su dag pa dang ma dag pa nyid do //
T02D1794:201a-19: yi ge gsum ni aom a'a: h'um gsum mo //
T02D1794:201a-20: de nyid ni 'da' bar mi bya ba ni yongs su blang bar bya ba nyid do //
T02D1794:201a-21: de las byung ba ni yi ge gsum las byung ba ste rigs drug pa'o //
T02D1794:201a-25: de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor te bshad zin to //
T02D1794:201a-26: 'di dag gi don yang thog mar srung ba'i 'khor
T02D1794:201a-27: lo sngon du 'gro bas stong pa nyid kyi ngang
T02D1794:201a-28: las rten gyi dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang dang bcas
T02D1794:201a-30: de nas mos pas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal
T02D1794:201a-31: bar byas pa ste slar stong pa nyid du byas
T02D1794:201a-32: pa las nyi ma dang zla ba dang padma dang
T02D1794:201a-33: / aom a'a: h'um zhes pa ni gsal bar bsam mo //
T02D1794:201a-34: de nas de dag zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dus te de la dmigs par bya'o //
T02D1794:201a-35: de yongs su gyur pa las dang po'i mgon po zla ba lta bu bsams te /
T02D1794:201a-36: der mi bskyod pa bzhugs pas zhal gsum pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bsams la /
T02D1794:201a-37: 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim pas rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1794:201a-38: lus la lha thams cad kyi yi ge dgod par
T02D1794:201a-39: bya'o // de nas nam mkha' la sangs rgyas thams
T02D1794:201a-40: cad bltas te lha mo so sos mchod pa sngon
T02D1794:201a-41: du 'gro bas gsol ba btab pas ji skad du
T02D1794:201a-42: 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas gnas gsum byin gyis
T02D1794:201a-43: bya'o // brlab par bya'o // de nas legs par
T02D1794:201a-44: sbyangs pa'i shes rab ma dang gnyis su med par
T02D1794:201b-0: @201b snyoms par 'jug pa cho ga 'dis 'og nas
T02D1794:201b-1: ston pa'i dkyil 'khor spros te sems can gyi don
T02D1794:201b-2: byas nas slar 'dus nas rang gi dkyil 'khor la
T02D1794:201b-5: sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam //
T02D1794:201b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim pa 'dis phra
T02D1794:201b-7: mo'i ting nge 'dzin sna'i rtse mor brtan par bya'o
T02D1794:201b-8: // gzhan yang 'od du zhu ba bslang ba dang zas la sogs pa legs par bza' ba dang /
T02D1794:201b-9: lha'i 'khor lo la bstod pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1794:201b-10: sogs pa'i yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
T02D1794:201b-11: bya'o // 'od gsal ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D1794:201b-12: kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa ste chos
T02D1794:201b-13: bya'o // kyi sku'o // de las byung ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D1794:201b-15: mkhas brtson zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1794:201b-18: rtsom pa che ba zhes pa ste /
T02D1794:201b-19: 'di dag gis rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T02D1794:201b-21: the tshom skye bar byed pa zhes bya ba la
T02D1794:201b-22: sogs pa rigs pa 'di bla ma las byung gi
T02D1794:201b-23: gzhan du rtog ge bas nam yang rnyed par mi
T02D1794:201b-24: 'gyur zhes nges par ston par byed do zhe'o //
T02D1794:201b-25: de rnams 'byung ba'i dam tshig ni de skyed par
T02D1794:201b-26: byed pa'i zhes bya ba ni dam las mi 'da'
T02D1794:201b-27: ba nyid do // dbang po gnyis zhes bya ba
T02D1794:201b-28: la sogs pas ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur bstan to
T02D1794:201b-29: ba nyid do // // gdul bya'i skye bo ni
T02D1794:201b-30: slob ba yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma
T02D1794:201b-31: ba nyid do // // yin pa'o // sku rnam
T02D1794:201b-32: pa gnyis ni longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku'o
T02D1794:201b-33: ba nyid do // // yin pa'o // // yang
T02D1794:201b-34: dag par ston pa ni sku dang gsung gi chos
T02D1794:201b-35: ston pa ste des smin pa dang grol bar byed
T02D1794:201b-36: pas de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:201b-37: ye shes nyid ces pa ni gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'o //
T02D1794:201b-38: sems can rnams kyi rgyud la zhes bya bas ni gsal bar bya ba'i yul bstan to //
T02D1794:201b-39: mi bskyod pa ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1794:201b-40: rnam par shes pa gsum gyi snang ba zhes pa ni shes pa'i snang ba nyid do //
T02D1794:201b-41: don dam pa'i bden pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa la bden pas so //
T02D1794:201b-42: brjod du med pas ni de'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02D1794:201b-43: rnam pa ma lus pa zil gyis mnan pas ni de'i las bstan to //
T02D1794:201b-44: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni
T02D1794:201b-45: chos kyi sku ste de las chu las nya'i tshul
T02D1794:201b-46: du rang gi skur bzhengs pa'o //
T02D1794:201b-48: nyon mongs pa lngas khyab pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ni spyir snying rje'i yul du bstan to //
T02D1794:201b-49: de lta na yang ci'i phyir snying rje skye zhe na /
T02D1794:202a-1: pa'i rang bzhin ni ye nas rnam par dag pa
T02D1794:202a-2: ste de yongs su shes pa nyid ni byang chub
T02D1794:202a-3: yin la de'i ngo bo nyid ni bdag yin no
T02D1794:202a-4: zhes pa 'dis ni nyon mongs pa dang rdo rje
T02D1794:202a-5: 'chang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su
T02D1794:202a-6: med cing gnyis su dbyer med do zhes dgongs pa
T02D1794:202a-7: 'chang dang / nyid do // bye brag tu bstan pa /
T02D1794:202a-8: nyon mongs pa zhe sdang ni sems khong du 'khrugs pa ste /
T02D1794:202a-9: de dang gang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:202a-10: de sbyang ba ni yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:202a-11: zhe sdang zhes pa'i bshad pa thugs rje chen po'i
T02D1794:202a-12: thabs kyi khro ba ni thugs rje chen pos sprul
T02D1794:202a-13: pa'o // de yang rab tu khros pa'i chos dang ldan pas ni zhe sdang ste /
T02D1794:202a-14: gang la zhe sdang dang 'dra pa'i chos yod pa'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:202a-15: de'i rigs ni de'i rigs su skyed pa'o //
T02D1794:202a-16: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu skyed pa ni sngags dang mthun pa'i lus skyed pa'o //
T02D1794:202a-18: sku dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa
T02D1794:202a-19: snyoms par zhugs pa zhes pa ni yab yum sbyor
T02D1794:202a-20: ba las te mngal nas skyes pa'i tshul can no
T02D1794:202a-21: // badzra dhrika ces pas ni dbyung ba'i sngags bstan to //
T02D1794:202a-22: de'i don ci zhe na rdo rje 'chang zhes pa'o //
T02D1794:202a-24: mngon par byang chub pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sa bon la sogs pa'o //
T02D1794:202a-25: de mtshon pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gang gis 'dzin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:202a-26: bde na ba gnyis ni don dam pa dang kun
T02D1794:202a-27: rdzob ste gnyis su med pa ni spros pa thams
T02D1794:202a-29: de nyid rdo rje ste rnam par rtog pa'i ri bo gcod pa ste /
T02D1794:202a-30: de gang dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:202a-31: de spros nas phyi rol gyi sems can thams cad kyi zhe sdang rnam par sbyangs te /
T02D1794:202a-32: slar log nas gtso bo'i mdun du bzhugs so zhes bya'o //
T02D1794:202a-33: ji lta bu'i rnam par bzhugs she na /
T02D1794:202a-34: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bor bzhugs so zhe'o //
T02D1794:202a-35: de ltar sbyor ba dang po ni ting nge 'dzin dang po nyid do //
T02D1794:202a-36: sems can rmongs pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu dang de kho na nyid kyi don mi shes pa'o //
T02D1794:202a-37: de sbyang ba ni de'i nyes pa sel ba'o //
T02D1794:202a-39: dbyung ba'i sngags ni dzi na dzi ka ces pa'o //
T02D1794:202a-40: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ni skad cig
T02D1794:202a-41: ma gcig gis sgrib pa thams cad dang bral bar
T02D1794:202a-43: kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems ni bshad zin to //
T02D1794:202a-45: gang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gang shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de yang shes pa nyid do //
T02D1794:202b-0: yang dag pa'i @202b mtha' ni de bzhin nyid de
T02D1794:202b-1: de ye shes gang gis yul du byas pa de
T02D1794:202b-3: nor gyis dregs pa ni nor la dga' bar byed pa'o //
T02D1794:202b-4: khengs pa ni nga rgyal chen po nyid dang ldan par gyur pa nyid do //
T02D1794:202b-5: sbyin pas 'dul ba ni nor bu rin po che'i
T02D1794:202b-6: sprin gyis nga rgyal rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o
T02D1794:202b-7: // nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas la yang
T02D1794:202b-8: dag gzhag pa ni nges nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin
T02D1794:202b-9: dang bral ba'i don dam pa'o //
T02D1794:202b-11: 'dod chags ni 'khrig pa dang yul la chags pa'o //
T02D1794:202b-12: de yang gang gis spong zhe na bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor te /
T02D1794:202b-13: ting nge 'dzin gang gis de yul du byas pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:202b-14: gang gis de lta bu'i rang bzhin yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir gsungs so zhes sbyar ro //
T02D1794:202b-15: 'dod chags chen po yang gang yin zhe na /
T02D1794:202b-17: dri ma med pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1794:202b-18: de'i rgyu ni de 'phel bar byed pa'i rgyu ste khu ba byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1794:202b-19: de las byung ba ni rgyu de las skyes pa ste /
T02D1794:202b-21: nges pa'i don du gang yin zhe na 'od gsal ba ste stong pa nyid do //
T02D1794:202b-22: de las byung ba ni sems can de lta bu gdul ba'i don du de'i skur sprul pa'o //
T02D1794:202b-23: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni chos thams cad
T02D1794:202b-24: ma 'dres par mkhyen pa gang la yod pa de
T02D1794:202b-26: de la chags pa ni de yang dag par nges pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1794:202b-27: 'khor ba ma lus par 'joms pa ni gang gis 'khor ba ma lus pa'i rtog pa 'joms pa'o //
T02D1794:202b-29: don yod pa grub pa ni ci'i phyir zhe na
T02D1794:202b-30: bya ba grub pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1794:202b-31: bstan to // 'od gsal ba la ci'i phyir zhe
T02D1794:202b-32: na mtshan ma med pa'i 'bras bu ste rab ste
T02D1794:202b-33: de la dmigs pas de 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:202b-34: phrag dog ni gzhan gyi yon tan la sems khong nas 'khrugs pa ste /
T02D1794:202b-35: gang gis de dang ldan pa'i sems can 'dul bar
T02D1794:202b-36: byed pa de'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1794:202b-37: // khams phra ba ni lte ba la gnas pa'i rlung ste /
T02D1794:202b-38: des thabs kyi ye shes byang chub kyi sems bkug
T02D1794:202b-39: nas mchog tu dga' ba skyed pa ste de las
T02D1794:202b-41: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang /
T02D1794:202b-43: rgyu de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:202b-44: 'dzin pa ni de dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1794:202b-45: zla ba ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1794:202b-46: rlung gis 'dzin pa ni de mi gtong pa'o //
T02D1794:202b-47: gdul bya ni khams gsum gyi sems can no //
T02D1794:202b-48: de'i mngon par 'dod pa ni de'i blang bar bya ba'o //
T02D1794:203a-1: pa'i bde ba chen po ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1794:203a-2: rigs 'di rnams zhes pa ni 'og nas ston to //
T02D1794:203a-3: phung po 'di dag ni gzugs la sogs pa ste
T02D1794:203a-4: de nyid don dam par sangs rgyas dang ngo bo
T02D1794:203a-6: de lta bu'i dbus su ma yin nam snyam pa la /
T02D1794:203a-7: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rkyen du byung //
T02D1794:203a-8: zhes pa ni 'di la brten nas bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrub ba nyid do //
T02D1794:203a-9: de'i phyir ni tha dad do zhe na /
T02D1794:203a-10: de bzhin nyid du gnyis med pa //
T02D1794:203a-11: zhes don dam par gnyis su med cing dbyer med pa'o //
T02D1794:203a-12: yang rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa'i don no //
T02D1794:203a-13: rdzogs sangs rgyas ni chags pa bral //
T02D1794:203a-14: 'dod chags can la de nyid do //
T02D1794:203a-16: m'a ma k'i ni 'khrig pa yi //
T02D1794:203a-17: reg byas mnyes par byed pa'i phyir //
T02D1794:203a-18: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no //
T02D1794:203a-20: zhe sdang ni mi bskyod pa ste zhe sdang can gyis 'gro ba 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:203a-21: de dga' ba ni de mnyes par byed pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02D1794:203a-22: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin nyid
T02D1794:203a-23: de rgyu dang ngo bo la sogs pa ma grub
T02D1794:203a-24: pa'i phyir ro // de la dga' ba ni de
T02D1794:203a-25: dang dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis te yang dag pa'i
T02D1794:203a-26: pa'i phyir ro // ye shes so // bcom ldan
T02D1794:203a-27: 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid ces bya
T02D1794:203a-28: ba la sogs pa'i don ni de dag kyang rdo
T02D1794:203a-29: rje 'chang gis sems can gyi don du de ltar
T02D1794:203a-30: bstan gyi don dam par ni ma yin no zhe'o
T02D1794:203a-31: pa'i phyir ro // ye shes so // // gzhan la yang de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D1794:203a-32: sku dang gsung dang thugs mi rtag pa ni skad cig gnyis pa la sogs par mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1794:203a-33: slu ba ni rtag par sems pa la'o //
T02D1794:203a-34: chos thams cad stong pa ni ji ltar brtag pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1794:203a-35: slu ba ni yod par 'dzin pa'i gang zag la'o //
T02D1794:203a-36: snang ba gsum ni bshad zin to //
T02D1794:203a-37: slar yang dngos po med par byas pa ni 'od
T02D1794:203a-38: gsal ba'i ngang du ste de nyid yod par 'dzin
T02D1794:203a-40: phung po la sogs pa ni sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1794:203a-41: ril por 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni sbyor ba'i thabs so //
T02D1794:203a-42: de thams cad dbye ba med par gyur pa ni de'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1794:203a-43: 'di ni thams cad rang gis brtags pas slu ba ste /
T02D1794:203a-44: bden par gyur pa'i don mthong bas //
T02D1794:203a-45: dman la bden par gyur pa slu //
T02D1794:203a-47: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1794:203a-48: gshin rje ni dmyal ba'i srung ma dang bcas pa
T02D1794:203a-49: ste de na dbang che bar snang ba'i phyir ro
T02D1794:203a-50: // khro bo chen po ni de dag 'jigs par snang ba'o //
T02D1794:203b-0: mthar thug mdzad cing 'jigs pa ni @203b gtum po'i
T02D1794:203b-1: las kyi don chen po dang ldan par byed pa'o
T02D1794:203b-2: // rmongs pa'i mun ba nyid ma rig ba ste
T02D1794:203b-3: dman par gyur ba'i phyir sdug bsngal sna tshogs nyams
T02D1794:203b-4: su myong bar byed pas gshin rje'o //
T02D1794:203b-5: don dam pa'i bden pas mthar thug par mdzad pa
T02D1794:203b-6: ni rang bzhin gyis bag chags dang bcas te rtsad
T02D1794:203b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang
T02D1794:203b-9: chub pa yang gang zhe na rin chen 'byung ldan
T02D1794:203b-10: no // 'od gsal pa ni mngon par byang chub ba las byung ba dang /
T02D1794:203b-11: de'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1794:203b-12: de nyid ni mi phyed pas rdo rje'o //
T02D1794:203b-13: rnam par rtog pa'i bdag nyid can ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'o //
T02D1794:203b-14: de 'od gsal bar 'jug pa ni stong pa nyid du byas pa'o //
T02D1794:203b-15: rdo rje'i dam tshig ni gang zhig des gang bsnyengs
T02D1794:203b-16: par bya zhe na rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1794:203b-17: pa'i khro bo'i tshul can te nges gdug pa can
T02D1794:203b-18: slob dpon la sdang ba la sogs pa bsregs pa
T02D1794:203b-19: ni don chen po dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1794:203b-20: ro // yang bye brag bsdu ba ste /
T02D1794:203b-21: rdo rje dam tshig nyid sreg pa'o //
T02D1794:203b-22: 'od dpag tu med pa ni chos rin po che
T02D1794:203b-23: ste chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i
T02D1794:203b-24: phyir ro // rta mgrin yang 'od dpag tu med pa ste de'i rigs su gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:203b-25: 'od gsal ba ni chos rin po che ste chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1794:203b-26: rta mgrin yang de las byung ba'i phyir de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:203b-27: nyon mongs pa rnams kyis ma gos pa ni de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:203b-28: de nyid 'jigs par mdzad pa ni de dang lhan cig par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:203b-29: padma ni skye gnas so zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1794:203b-30: don ni rdo rje padma snyoms par zhugs pas byang
T02D1794:203b-31: chub sems phab ste des bde ba dang bde ba
T02D1794:203b-32: dam pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to
T02D1794:203b-33: ; / rnam par dag pa'i gnas ni rnam par
T02D1794:203b-34: dag par byed pa'i rten te gang yin zhe na
T02D1794:203b-35: ; 'od gsal ba'o // bgegs ni bi n'a ya
T02D1794:203b-36: ga la sogs pa ste de mthar byed pa ni
T02D1794:203b-37: thabs gang gi sgo nas don chen po ldan par
T02D1794:203b-38: byed pa'i phyir de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1794:203b-39: des pa'i don du bgegs zhes bya ba gang zhig ce na /
T02D1794:203b-40: bgegs ni khams bzhi po ste /
T02D1794:203b-41: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rang gi lus kyis bsdus pa'o //
T02D1794:203b-42: de la yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1794:203b-43: de dag 'phel ba dang 'grib pas lus gzir bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:203b-44: thabs kyi ye shes shar bas rnam par 'jig pa
T02D1794:203b-45: ni gang gis lus kyi rgyun las byang chub sems
T02D1794:203b-46: phab ste de'i nyes pa dang bral bar byas pa
T02D1794:204a-1: 'di la kha cig gis 'di skad ces de bzhin
T02D1794:204a-2: gshegs pa'i gtso bo dang 'khor gyi rnam par snang
T02D1794:204a-3: ba 'di tha dad pa'am gcig pa'am de las gzhan
T02D1794:204a-5: re zhig dang por tha dad pa ni ma yin
T02D1794:204a-6: te so sor ma 'dres par rnam par snang ba'i
T02D1794:204a-7: phyir dang gang gis rag las de'i dbang gis 'gyur
T02D1794:204a-8: ro zhes bya bar yang mi nus te /
T02D1794:204a-9: dur dang dkar po lta bu'o //
T02D1794:204a-10: rang gi blo dang 'gyur ba yang ma yin te brtags pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:204a-11: gal te yin no zhe na yang blang bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid do //
T02D1794:204a-12: phyogs nges par 'grub par mi 'gyur te de nyid kyi phyir tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1794:204a-13: gal te gcig pa nyid do zhe na yang shin tu rigs pa ma yin te /
T02D1794:204a-14: kha dog dang gnas la sogs pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:204a-15: gal te gnas gcig pas gcig pa nyid do zhen yang rigs pa ma yin te /
T02D1794:204a-16: thams cad sa'i dkyil 'khor gcig la brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1794:204a-17: gal te lus 'dra bas gcig pa nyid do zhe
T02D1794:204a-18: na yang ma yin te gang gis mi rnams kyi
T02D1794:204a-19: lus 'dra bas gcig pa ma grub pa bzhin no
T02D1794:204a-20: // gal te ye shes gcig pa nyid kyis gcig
T02D1794:204a-21: pa nyid do zhen yang ma yin te mi rtag
T02D1794:204a-22: pa dang mi rtag pa can yang shin tu gcig
T02D1794:204a-23: // par 'gyur ro // gal te rig pa tsam
T02D1794:204a-24: du 'dod pa'o zhe na yang ma yin te sangs
T02D1794:204a-25: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang so so'i skye
T02D1794:204a-26: bo'i bar la sogs pa zag pa med pa'i sa
T02D1794:204a-27: bon dang bcas pas bsdus pa'i phyir thams cad kyang
T02D1794:204a-28: // par 'gyur ro // ngo // gal te shes
T02D1794:204a-29: pa tha dad du gyur pas yin no zhe na
T02D1794:204a-30: so so rang gi rig pas brtags na dbyer med
T02D1794:204a-31: // par 'gyur ro // ngo // pa'i phyir ro
T02D1794:204a-32: // yang snga ma'i sa na 'jug pa nyid do
T02D1794:204a-33: zhe na yang ma yin te /
T02D1794:204a-34: rang gi gdul bya'i dbang gis sna tshogs par snang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:204a-35: de bas na 'dar yang sangs rgyas thams cad dbyer
T02D1794:204a-36: med kyang rang gi gdul bya'i dbang gis sna tshogs
T02D1794:204a-39: gcig par 'gyur ro zhe na de ni 'dod pa ste /
T02D1794:204a-40: de'i rang bzhin gyi phyir dus thams cad du gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1794:204a-41: de ltar na sems can gyi 'dod pas byung ba'i
T02D1794:204a-42: phyir dus thams cad du 'dod pas ji lta ba
T02D1794:204a-44: gal te ni rang gi rnam par rtog pas bsgribs pa'i phyir mi snang ngo //
T02D1794:204a-45: 'dod pa la rag las pa'i dngos po ni mi
T02D1794:204a-46: snang bar mi 'gyur te gang gi phyir rang gi
T02D1794:204a-47: 'dod pa tsam gtso bor byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:204a-48: gal te rang gi 'dod pa gtso bor mi byed
T02D1794:204a-49: na ni tha dad pas snang bar mi 'gyur te
T02D1794:204b-0: gal te sgrib @204b pas mi snang na sgrib pa
T02D1794:204b-1: dang bral ba'i dus na tha dad pa mi snang
T02D1794:204b-2: ste de ni med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:204b-3: gang gi phyir sems can gyi mos pa 'ba' zhig
T02D1794:204b-4: las ma yin te smon lam chen po'i 'phen pas
T02D1794:204b-5: kyang snang ngo // de bas na gnyis tshogs na 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D1794:204b-6: yang ci tha dad par 'gyur ba'i smon lam 'grub pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1794:204b-7: tha dad pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya
T02D1794:204b-8: ba'i phyir te 'di ltar tha dad pa'i sems can
T02D1794:204b-9: rnams la mthun pa dang mi mthun pa gcig gis
T02D1794:204b-10: don byed pa ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:204b-11: gal te de lta na rgyu gnyis las grub pa'i phyir gcig las sna tshogs su ni snang na /
T02D1794:204b-12: gang gi phyir shes pa sna tshogs par gyur pa
T02D1794:204b-13: nyid de gal te de ltar ma gyur na thams
T02D1794:204b-14: cad mkhyen pa grub par mi 'gyur ro zhe na
T02D1794:204b-15: ma yin te / gang gi phyir de'i rgyu tshogs
T02D1794:204b-16: pa de tsam gyis shes bya thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T02D1794:204b-17: tshul du snang gi don dam par ni ma yin
T02D1794:204b-18: te sgyu ma'i rta la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D1794:204b-19: gal te de lta na ni da ni zag pa zad do //
T02D1794:204b-20: da ni chos thams cad kyi don yongs su shes
T02D1794:204b-21: pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di legs par
T02D1794:204b-22: gnas par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
T02D1794:204b-24: 'dir chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi don ji lta ba bzhin la dgongs pa'o //
T02D1794:204b-25: gal te mtshan ma thams cad mkhyen na cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1794:204b-26: mtshan ma ni thog ma med pa'i las kyis bsgrubs pas 'khrul pa'i phyir la /
T02D1794:204b-27: 'khrul pa'i yul la dmigs pa'i phyir 'khrul ba'i yul
T02D1794:204b-28: can gyi shes par 'gyur gyi ye shes ni ma
T02D1794:204b-29: yin no // gal te de nyid ye shes so
T02D1794:204b-30: zhe na gang gi phyir ji ltar gnas pa'i don
T02D1794:204b-31: shes pas ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1794:204b-33: de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so zhe na /
T02D1794:204b-34: de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i shes pa nyid
T02D1794:204b-35: sprul pa zhes bya bar yang mi 'gyur te me
T02D1794:204b-36: long lta bu'i ye shes dang bral ba'i phyir ro
T02D1794:204b-37: // de ni de la yang mtshungs so //
T02D1794:204b-38: de bas na 'dir 'khor gyi snang ba ma gtogs pa gzhan ma yin no //
T02D1794:204b-39: gal te longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sgrub pa nyid de /
T02D1794:204b-40: sprul pa'i las bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir ro
T02D1794:204b-41: zhe na ma yin te snga ma'i skyon nyid do
T02D1794:204b-42: // gal te 'khrul pa ni 'khrul par ma 'khrul
T02D1794:204b-43: pa ni ma 'khrul par mkhyen na ji ltar 'khrul
T02D1794:204b-44: // / mtshan ma la dmigs pa'am mtshan mar snang
T02D1794:204b-45: ba de mi 'khrul pa ma yin pa de brjod
T02D1794:204b-46: // / dgos so // gal te gzugs dang sems so zhe na /
T02D1794:205a-0: gzugs ltar snang ba'i sa bon las byung ba'i phyir legs par bshad par @205a * //
T02D1794:205a-2: 'di ltar chos 'di dag las kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis
T02D1794:205a-3: byung ba ste de nyid las sna tshogs par snang
T02D1794:205a-4: ba'i phyir ro // gal te sna tshogs pa de gcig pa'i rang bzhin yin no zhe na /
T02D1794:205a-5: de ltar snang bar gyur pa'i shes pa snang ba
T02D1794:205a-6: nyid las mngon sum dang ldan pa'i skyes bu sa
T02D1794:205a-7: bon sna tshogs pa nyid do //
T02D1794:205a-8: dge ba'i las kyis bsgrubs so zhe na thams cad
T02D1794:205a-9: dge ba'i las dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur bas
T02D1794:205a-10: ci'i phyir 'og ma mi snang ngo //
T02D1794:205a-11: gal te shes pa nyid do zhe na /
T02D1794:205a-12: tha dad pa'am tha dad pa ma yin par 'gyur /
T02D1794:205a-13: de ni gcig gis gcig spangs pa'i phyir /
T02D1794:205a-14: de las gzhan pa brjod par mi nus so //
T02D1794:205a-15: gang gi phyir de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang
T02D1794:205a-16: bzhin du ma grub na ni gcig yod pa med
T02D1794:205a-17: na med pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1794:205a-18: gzhan yang don dam par gnyis su 'gyur ba 'di yang ma bzlog par 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02D1794:205a-19: de bas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad chos
T02D1794:205a-20: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya
T02D1794:205a-21: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gzugs
T02D1794:205a-22: mi dmigs / gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs /
T02D1794:205a-23: rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi dmigs rnam par
T02D1794:205a-24: shes pa'i bar gyi mtshan mar mi dmigs so zhes
T02D1794:205a-25: bya ba la sogs pa dang gzhan yang sangs rgyas
T02D1794:205a-26: thams cad ni don dam par ye shes gcig pa
T02D1794:205a-28: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid thugs su
T02D1794:205a-29: chud pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba 'di legs par
T02D1794:205a-31: de bas na gang gis snang ba chos thams cad
T02D1794:205a-32: spros pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas bzhin
T02D1794:205a-33: du smon lam chen po'i mthus sems can gyi snang
T02D1794:205a-34: ba la sku gcig dang du ma dang /
T02D1794:205a-35: gsung dang thugs sna tshogs pa nyid kyang rdo rje
T02D1794:205a-36: 'chang chen po'i ye shes kyi snang ba tsam du
T02D1794:205a-38: rdo rje slob dpon lus 'di la //
T02D1794:205a-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sbyor ba dang
T02D1794:205a-40: po'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du brjod pa ste
T02D1794:205a-41: gang gis rang gi gnas su lha so so'i yi
T02D1794:205a-42: ge bsam par bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1794:205a-43: gang gis blo dman don du rgyud chen 'grel //
T02D1794:205a-44: legs brtsams de las gsal bar ma gyur pa //
T02D1794:205a-45: de 'dir bdag gis cung zad legs par bkrol //
T02D1794:205a-46: dman pa rnams kyi don du blta bar gyis //
T02D1794:205a-47: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel bshad /
